snippet.title: Honeycomb: The World Beyond – Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Explorers! Honeycomb: The World Beyond has a new release date - we’re moving the release to Q3 2024. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1510440/Honeycomb/ 

For the console players, we’d like to announce that we plan to release Honeycomb: The World Beyond both on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S!

Honeycomb: The World Beyond comes with a set of various features:

🌍 Explore the unknown with vast vibrant biomes, each with different plants and animals for you to discover.
🧪 Science is an art – awaken your inner bioengineer and experiment with different plants and animals.
🔥 Push yourself to the limit – remember that Sota7 is a dangerous place. Will you risk uncovering its secrets? The choice is yours, explorer.
⚒️ Gather, build, survive, repeat – to survive and conduct the experiments, you’ll have to first develop your base. Players who aren’t keen builders can utilize the planning mode, which will do the job for them.

Join our social media to keep up to date:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/HoneycombFW // https://twitter.com/FrozenWayGames  
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HoneycombFW // https://www.facebook.com/frozenWay 
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/frozenwayofficial
